Public NotInheritable Class DeploymentSection Inherits ConfigurationSection

summary.span: 定義組態設定，這個設定通常是在實際執行伺服器上用來覆寫僅適用於開發電腦的應用程式層級設定。

span.span: Defines a configuration setting that is typically used on a production server to override application-level settings that are appropriate only on development computers.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 組態系統會呼叫這個建構函式。This constructor is called by the ASP.NET configuration system. 取得執行個體類別使用方法。You obtain an instance of the class by using the method.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指定電腦上的 Web 應用程式是否以 模式部署。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether Web applications on the computer are deployed in mode.

value.span: 如果以 模式部署 Web 應用程式，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if Web applications are deployed in mode; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當是`true`，ASP.NET 會停用追蹤輸出，停用偵錯功能，並停用詳細遠端使用者的系統產生的錯誤訊息。When is `true`, ASP.NET disables trace output, disables debug capabilities, and disables detailed system-generated error messages for remote users. 應用程式的`customErrors`應用程式 Web.config 檔中的項目`mode`屬性強制`On`。For applications that have a `customErrors` element in the application Web.config file, the `mode` attribute is forced to `On`. 這些設定會覆寫應用程式 Web.config 檔案中所做的任何設定。These settings override any settings that are made in application Web.config files. > [!NOTE] > 當您使用`retail`設定，您應該繼續設定`debug`屬性`false`應用程式部署到伺服器的 Web.config 檔中。When you use the `retail` setting, you should continue to set the `debug` attribute to `false` in application Web.config files that are deployed to the server. `debug`設定停用要求執行逾時，並不覆寫由`retail`設定。The `debug` setting disables request execution timeout, and this is not overridden by the `retail` setting. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱For more information, see. [大部分的一般 ASP.NET 支援問題-從深層內支援的 Microsoft 開發人員報告](https://www.hanselman.com/blog/MostCommonASPNETSupportIssuesReportingFromDeepInsideMicrosoftDeveloperSupport.aspx)Scott Hanselman 部落格上。[Most Common ASP.NET Support issues - Reporting from deep inside Microsoft Developer Support](https://www.hanselman.com/blog/MostCommonASPNETSupportIssuesReportingFromDeepInsideMicrosoftDeveloperSupport.aspx) on Scott Hanselman's blog. ## Examples 下列組態檔範例示範如何將此屬性設定為`true`machine.config 檔案中。The following configuration file example shows how to set this property to `true` in the machine.config file. Machine.config 檔案位於此資料夾中：The machine.config file is located in this folder: `%windir%\Microsoft.NET\Framework\\Config` ``` ```
